name: Goryo
trait:
You can only see D.O.T.S. of the Goryo through a camera, whilst there are no players in the same room. 
 
**D.O.T.S. is FORCED evidence on nightmare** Goryos have an increased chance to do D.O.T.S..
 
The Goryo can't change it's favorite Room or roam long distance.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
ability: The Goryo has no hidden abilities.
